message.body: Hasn't come! Want to just give me a check in Philly? I think that's easiest and I'm cool w that!
Aw man, that is so frustrating. What in the world happened? Are you sure that's cool? It's not a small amount!
I'm sure it will get here or maybe is lost in mess of farm, but don't want safety of check to be comprised. Np about waiting till Philly - I don't spend
$ out here at all and will be a welcome boost to acct in October :)
Btw! I think I'd like the smallest room. Same Amt (400) as mid size. R u ok w that?
Sure! It's all yours. Weirdest thing about that check but I'll cancel it to be safe. Thank you for your flexibility and understanding. :)
But of course!! Do u have to pay a fee to cancel?
I was wondering about that too, it's possible. But better safe than sorry.
Ok well let me know if so and I'll split w ya or something. Hopefully not! What about the bedroom? Any thoughts? Know you haven't seen then in person.
Oh yea, I meant to say that the bedroom is all yours. I'm indebted to you (literally and figuratively)
And no worries about the fee, but I really appreciate it!
Ok! :) And thanks! The room mid room is nice, good size, has to use the closet in the hall but has room for a dresser too.
